mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, battery_id, usable_status, box_status, status, create_time, update_time, del_flag from eletctricity.t_electricity_cabinet_box where id = #{id}
select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, battery_id, usable_status, box_status, status, create_time, update_time, del_flag from eletctricity.t_electricity_cabinet_box limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into eletctricity.t_electricity_cabinet_box(electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, battery_id, usable_status, box_status, status, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{cellNo}, #{batteryId}, #{usableStatus}, #{boxStatus}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update eletctricity.t_electricity_cabinet_box
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
cell_no = #{cellNo},
battery_id = #{batteryId},
usable_status = #{usableStatus},
box_status = #{boxStatus},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
